page.title: 05REDDISH BOYS CLUB
page.content: {Reddish boys club}started approximately{25}years ago. Brian is now one of the leaders.{Reddish boys {club}needs as much money as possible to repair the{gym}roof. {Reddish boys club}is a club to keep boys off the streets. It is open 6 nights a week. For the young ones it starts at 6:30-9:00.For the older kids that are over 13 come in at 8:30 till 10:00. In the gym we are going to have hockey, 5 aside and badminton. Out-side we play football. To get in it cost 30p and to join it is Â£1. On a {disco}night it is{30p.}At the boys club we have{snooker, pool, pac man and a{bar}that sells{drinks}and{food. Some days we go on trips. On friday nights we have a{disco}for the under 13's
